title: Couldn't update and reinstall stable
body:
I update rust use `rustup update`, but it isn't success.
Log is here,
```
info: syncing channel updates for 'stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu'
info: latest update on 2018-05-10, rust version 1.26.0 (a77568041 2018-05-07)
info: downloading component 'rustc'
error: component download failed for rustc-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
info: syncing channel updates for 'nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu'
info: latest update on 2018-05-25, rust version 1.28.0-nightly (c2d46037f 2018-05-24)
info: downloading component 'rustc'
info: downloading component 'rust-std'
info: downloading component 'cargo'
info: downloading component 'rust-docs'
info: downloading component 'rls-preview'
info: downloading component 'rust-analysis'
info: downloading component 'rust-src'
info: downloading component 'rustfmt-preview'
info: removing component 'rustc'
info: removing component 'rust-std'
info: removing component 'cargo'
info: removing component 'rust-docs'
info: removing component 'rls-preview'
info: removing component 'rust-analysis'
info: removing component 'rust-src'
info: removing component 'rustfmt-preview'
info: installing component 'rustc'
info: installing component 'rust-std'
info: installing component 'cargo'
info: installing component 'rust-docs'
info: installing component 'rls-preview'
info: installing component 'rust-analysis'
info: installing component 'rust-src'
info: installing component 'rustfmt-preview'
info: checking for self-updates

  stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu update failed - rustc 1.25.0 (84203cac6 2018-03-25)
       nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu updated - rustc 1.28.0-nightly (c2d46037f 2018-05-24)

```
I tried reinstall stable use `rustup uninstall stable` and `rustup install stable`, but reinstall is failed.
Log is here,
```
info: syncing channel updates for 'stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu'
info: latest update on 2018-05-10, rust version 1.26.0 (a77568041 2018-05-07)
info: downloading component 'rustc'
error: component download failed for rustc-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
info: caused by: could not download file from 'https://static.rust-lang.org/dist/2018-05-10/rustc-1.26.0-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz' to '/home/celluloce/.rustup/downloads/58d2e6c167c0a7d5fb4f76cc57ce65bd08c93e34bbfb97177523c9db49468a9a.partial'
info: caused by: error during download
info: caused by: [33] Requested range was not delivered by the server (HTTP server doesn't seem to support byte ranges. Cannot resume.)
```
So there is only the nightly in my PC.
Please help me.
